summary: A crucified body dated back to the first century A.D is uncovered at an ancient cave in Jerusalem. Trouble ensues as word spreads.
cast: Antonio Banderas|Olivia Williams|John Shrapnel|Derek Jacobi|Jason Flemyng|Lillian Lux|John Wood|Makram Khoury|Vernon Dobtcheff|Ian McNeice|Mohammad Bakri|Yoav Dekelbaum|Sami Samir|Jordan Licht|Limor Goldstein|Ariel Horowitz|Roi Horowitz|Shai Sharabi|Lillian Lax|Arieh Elias|Sivan Shwartz|Gilad Bergman|Halima Abu Aguva|John Glover
title: The Body (El cuerpo)
